SCRIPT.MSCRI: :SET &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# = "" :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TXT_TIMEOUT# <> "" : SET &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# = STR_CAT(&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#, " -tt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TXT_TIMEOUT#") :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SESSION_TIMEOUT# <> "" : SET &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# = STR_CAT(&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#, " -st &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SESSION_TIMEOUT#") :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_NUM_RETRY# <> "" : SET &SIEBEL_PROPERTIES# = STR_CAT(&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#, " -re &UC4RB_SIEBEL_NUM_RETRY#") :ENDIF
